channel.title: Toronto International Film Festival 2025 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Toronto International Film Festival 2025 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Poetic License’ Review: Maude Apatow’s Directorial Debut Is a Bighearted but Frustratingly Aimless Campus Comedy
item.description: Leslie Mann plays a woman auditing a poetry class and Cooper Hoffman and Andrew Barth Feldman the students vying for her attention in the TIFF-bowing film.
